column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Oh how I LOVE this place!! My favorite restaurant in Lincoln Park. First off
column2: the sangria is a must - just do yourself a favor and order the whole pitcher. The red and white peach ones are my favorite. This is a tapas restaurant so they are small plates that are meant to be shared. Sadly I don't have photos
column3: all the times I've been here is for late dinner so it's too dark to take them. Here is a list of my recommended tapas to get:
